inclusion.criterion: Women with previously untreated metastatic breast cancer, ER/PR/HER2/neu negative.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal cardiac function as evidenced by LVEF within institutional normal limits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of hypersensitivity reactions to doxil or bevacizumab
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarct or unstable angina within 6 months before enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior anthracycline dose exceeding 360 mg/m2 for doxorubicin (including DOXIL) or 720 mg/m2 for epirubicin.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.
